example.text: The House Republican #DefaultOnAmerica Act would mean 1,000,000 seniors in need would lose access to Meals on Wheels. They’d rather turn their backs on our seniors than pay the bills we’ve already run up. Not going to happen.
We have bipartisan support for the SAFE Banking Act, and we have a path to get this bill to the Senate floor. Let’s get this done! [[url]]

Trump is again advocating his horrific cruel strategy of ripping children out of their parents’ arms to discourage immigration. Abusing children is NEVER acceptable. I will fight with every nerve and sinew to make sure America never again treats children in this fashion.

Legal cannabis businesses are forced to operate in all-cash—leaving them vulnerable to armed robbery and money laundering. We have a path to get SAFE Banking passed this year, and I will work to get it to the finish line. [[url]]

In November, Jeff led Senate colleagues in pushing Secretary of State Antony Blinken to call for an ambitious approach and bold leadership from the United States to combat this global plastic pollution crisis. Jeff urged Secretary Blinken to use the first session of negotiations over global plastics regulation to emphasize the importance of reducing plastic pollution at the source.
